00028 #ifdef BOOST_HAS_PTHREADS
00029 #  define HT_THREAD_ID_DECL(_var_) pthread_t _var_
00030 #  define HT_ASSERT_SAME_THREAD(_tid_) if (pthread_self() != (_tid_)) \
00031      HT_FATALF("expected current thread id %u, got %u", \
00032                (unsigned)(_tid_), (unsigned) pthread_self())
00033 #  define HT_THREAD_ID_SET(_var_) _var_ = pthread_self()
00034 #else
